headline: Ask HN: How to flash a (UHD) Blu-ray drive with Libredrive (on Linux)?
description:
Perhaps the most commonly associated program with ripping DVDs and blu-rays, MakeMKV, has some resources on their forums, but the documentation [0] is at least questionable and doesn't directly address Linux in any way. I don't see any checksums to verify download integrity and some "firmware" files are hosted on filehosts such as Google Drive and Mediafire. There's a Libredrive post by an admin, [1] but there are no instructions at the time.

I want to flash in order to increase reading speeds and make my (Libredrive-compatible) drive capable of ripping all current BD protections.

[0] https://forum.makemkv.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=19634

[1] https://forum.makemkv.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=18856
